General Description
Located along the Swamp Rabbit Trail in downtown Greenville, the Embassy Suites Greenville Downtown Riverplace provides guests with exceptional access to hundreds of shops, restaurants and the award-winning Falls Park. Contemporary patterns and styles combine with classic textures and finishes to bring a timeless quality to the interiors of this welcoming all-suites hotel.Make yourself at home in a comfortable studio suite or two-room suite with spacious living area. Each suite features complimentary WiFi, a mini refrigerator, microwave, wet bar, sofa bed and work desk. A select number of our suites offer balconies overlooking the downtown skyline while others include a premium room package with an assortment of treats.
